title: Pennsylvania Department of Health, Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facilities, Pennsylvania, 2007
name: Pennsylvania Department of Health, Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facilities, Pennsylvania, 2007
description:
Abstract:

    PA Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facilities from the PA Dept of Health's quality assurance database.  Current as of 10/29/2007.

    Purpose:

    This layer was developed for use in emergency situations and for the general public.

    Supplemental_Information:

    The psychiatric residential treatment facility addresses were geocoded.  Geocoding of addresses creates points of estimated locations.  These locations were not verified.  The user should assume that there is some spatial error.

Time_Period_of_Content:
